SAMPLE	Sample_title	Sample_supplementary_file	Sample_source_name	Sample_organism	Sample_characteristics	Sample_molecule	Sample_extract_protocol	Sample_label	Sample_label_protocol	Sample_hyb_protocol	Sample_scan_protocol	Sample_data_processing	Sample_description	Sample_platform_id
1	sample1	sample1.CEL	Brain	Rattus norvegicus	Primary neuronal culture	Total RNA	TRIzol (Invitrogen) followed by RNeasy column cleanup (Qiagen) using the manufacturers’ protocols	Biotin	"Affymetrix GeneChip® IVT Labeling Kit, according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)"	Affymetrix Eukaryotic Target Hybridization protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)	Affymetrix® GeneChip® Scanner 3000 with GCOS software according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)	"Probe set summarization and normalization was performed by robust multi-array averaging (RMA, including background subtraction, summarization by median polish and quantile normalization) using the R/Bioconductor package affy."	Primary culture from cerebral cortices of rat P1 pups	GPL1355
2	sample2	sample2.CEL	Brain	Rattus norvegicus	Primary neuronal culture	Total RNA	TRIzol (Invitrogen) followed by RNeasy column cleanup (Qiagen) using the manufacturers’ protocols	Biotin	"Affymetrix GeneChip® IVT Labeling Kit, according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)"	Affymetrix Eukaryotic Target Hybridization protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)	Affymetrix® GeneChip® Scanner 3000 with GCOS software according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)	"Probe set summarization and normalization was performed by robust multi-array averaging (RMA, including background subtraction, summarization by median polish and quantile normalization) using the R/Bioconductor package affy."	Primary culture from cerebral cortices of rat P1 pups	GPL1355
